section.p: You can create new XSLT parameter set or modify an existing one. To do this, open XSLT Parameter Set Dialog: View Stylesheet Parameters XSLT Parameter Sets... :

note.p: Note, that not every top-level XSLT parameter is shown in the dialog. In order to be present, it should have se:type extension parameter. See .

If you wish to save changes in XSLT Parameter Sets go to View Save View... to save your changes either for the current document or the template. If you forgot to save the changes and closed the document, then open document from Recent File List: your changes will be restored for this document.
